memberdef.name: STAFFTYPE_TAB_SLASH_WIDTH
memberdef.initializer: 1.2 /* X width of half note slash */

memberdef.name: STAFFTYPE_TAB_SLASH_SLANTY
memberdef.initializer: 0.8 /* the Y coord of the slash slant */

memberdef.name: STAFFTYPE_TAB_SLASH_DISPL
memberdef.initializer: 0.8 /* the total displacement between one slash and the next: includes slash thickness and empty space between slashes*/
